BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

HeroSection.title: Connect
HeroSection.subtitle: Optimize your campaign effectiveness
HeroSection.description: Find the right KOL, evaluate effectiveness, and collaborate quickly on a single platform. Hundreds of KOLs in diverse industries are ready to partner with your brand.

connect_card.title: Quick Connection
connect_card.description: Search and filter KOLs by industry, platform, and customer file in seconds.

conversion_effectiveness_card.title: Increase Conversion Effectiveness
conversion_effectiveness_card.description: KOLs recommended based on data matching your product, optimizing costs and results.

Social_card.title: Transparent & Clear
Social_card.description: Public information about KOLs, pricing, and effectiveness to help brands easily choose.

campaign_card.title: Simple Campaign Management
campaign_card.description: Track progress, discuss, and approve content directly on the system.

Products.title: Featured Products
Products.description: Discover featured products, attractive offers, and high commission rates for KOL/KOC.

PlatformSection.title: Countless products and KOLs on the platform
PlatformSection.description: Find and work with KOLs easily on one platform.

ProcessSection.title: Cooperation Process
ProcessSection.description: Transparent, clear, and systematic cooperation process helps KOL/KOC and brands achieve the best results.

details.goals: Understand: brand values, product category, target audience, campaign goals...
details.kpi: Review: brand reputation, previous campaigns, competitor analysis, market positioning...
details.kol_type: Prepare: showcase portfolio, engagement metrics, content style samples, audience demographics.
details.check: Verify: brand authenticity, product quality, campaign alignment with personal values.
details.output: Result: Complete profile and portfolio ready for brand review.

details.goals: Brief content: campaign objectives, product information, key messages, target audience...
details.kpi: Requirements: content format, posting schedule, deliverables, approval process, deadlines...
details.kol_type: Review: collaboration terms, exclusivity clauses, usage rights, payment structure.
details.check: Evaluate: campaign fit, timeline feasibility, content requirements, brand guidelines.
details.output: Result: Initial response with questions and availability confirmation.

details.goals: Pricing: base rate, additional deliverables, usage rights, exclusivity fees...
details.kpi: Include: timeline breakdown, content formats, revision rounds, rush fees if applicable...
details.kol_type: Negotiate: payment terms, milestone payments, cancellation policy, content ownership.
details.check: Clarify: approval process, revision limits, posting requirements, performance expectations.
details.output: Result: Final quote and signed contract agreement.

details.goals: Content: follow brief guidelines, incorporate key messages, showcase product naturally...
details.kpi: Deliverables: main post, stories, reels, or other formats as specified in contract...
details.kol_type: Process: ideation, shooting, editing, caption writing, hashtag research.
details.check: Review: brand compliance, message clarity, visual quality, engagement optimization.
details.output: Result: Draft content ready for brand review and approval.

details.goals: Quality check: visual appeal, message accuracy, brand guideline compliance...
details.kpi: Optimize: captions, hashtags, posting time, engagement hooks, call-to-action...
details.kol_type: Edit: make adjustments, ensure authenticity, maintain personal style.
details.check: Verify: all requirements met, no brand guideline violations, optimal engagement potential.
details.output: Result: Edited content submitted for brand approval.

details.goals: Posting: scheduled time, correct platform, proper tagging, brand mentions...
details.kpi: Engagement: respond to comments, share in stories, cross-post if required...
details.kol_type: Monitor: initial engagement, comments, shares, saves, reach metrics.
details.check: Ensure: all posting requirements met, brand tags correct, content live as scheduled.
details.output: Result: Content published and live on all specified platforms.

details.goals: Metrics: reach, impressions, engagement rate, clicks, saves, shares...
details.kpi: Analytics: audience demographics, peak engagement times, top performing content elements...
details.kol_type: Document: screenshots, platform analytics, engagement breakdown, ROI insights.
details.check: Verify: all metrics accurate, report format matches requirements, insights provided.
details.output: Result: Complete performance report delivered to brand.

details.goals: Campaign objectives: brand awareness, product launch, sales conversion, market penetration...
details.kpi: Target metrics: reach, engagement rate, click-through rate, conversion rate, ROI...
details.kol_type: Select: Macro KOLs for reach, Micro for engagement, Nano for authenticity, KOC for reviews.
details.check: Evaluate: follower quality, content style, engagement authenticity, audience match, past performance.
details.output: Result: Shortlist of 3-10 KOLs matching campaign criteria.

details.goals: Include: product information, campaign objectives, key messages, target audience, brand voice...
details.kpi: Specify: content formats, posting schedule, deliverables, approval process, deadlines...
details.kol_type: Provide: product samples, brand guidelines, visual assets, reference materials, contact details.
details.check: Review: brief completeness, clarity of requirements, realistic expectations, brand compliance.
details.output: Result: Comprehensive brief document sent to selected KOLs for review.

details.goals: Compare: pricing, deliverables, timeline, exclusivity terms, usage rights...
details.kpi: Negotiate: payment structure, milestone payments, cancellation terms, content ownership...
details.kol_type: Finalize: contract terms, approval workflow, revision process, performance expectations.
details.check: Verify: budget alignment, legal compliance, clear deliverables, payment schedule.
details.output: Result: Signed contracts with selected KOLs, project kickoff initiated.

details.goals: Evaluate: brand guideline compliance, message accuracy, visual quality, engagement potential...
details.kpi: Check: key messages included, product showcased correctly, call-to-action clear, hashtags appropriate...
details.kol_type: Provide: feedback, revision requests, approval or request changes.
details.check: Ensure: content meets brief requirements, brand standards, legal compliance, quality standards.
details.output: Output: Approved content ready for publication or revision requests sent.

details.goals: Confirm: all revisions addressed, brand guidelines followed, quality standards met...
details.kpi: Verify: posting schedule confirmed, platform requirements met, tagging and mentions correct...
details.kol_type: Approve: final content, posting timeline, engagement strategy, cross-posting plan.
details.check: Final check: legal clearance, brand compliance, message accuracy, visual quality.
details.output: Result: Final approval granted, content cleared for publication.

details.goals: Monitor: posting time, platform presence, tagging accuracy, initial engagement...
details.kpi: Track: real-time metrics, engagement rate, reach, impressions, comments, shares...
details.kol_type: Observe: audience response, sentiment, questions, feedback, engagement patterns.
details.check: Verify: all posting requirements met, brand mentions correct, engagement as expected.
details.output: Result: Content live and performing, ongoing monitoring dashboard active.

details.goals: Measure: campaign KPIs, ROI, conversion rates, brand awareness lift, sales impact...
details.kpi: Analyze: engagement metrics, audience insights, content performance, platform breakdown...
details.kol_type: Process: final payments, performance bonuses if applicable, contract closure.
details.check: Verify: all deliverables completed, performance targets met, payment terms fulfilled.
details.output: Result: Complete campaign report, final payment, relationship maintained for future.
